elements.name: Alice is able to confirm interest using biometric authentication in under 2 seconds

steps.name: Phase 0 experimental environment is set up
test infrastructure is instrumented for measurement
privacy-compliant event tracking is enabled
Alice receives "Bob wants to connect" notification
Alice reviews Bob's verified health passport (anonymous)
Alice taps "Connect" to confirm interest
Alice completes Face ID authentication
biometric assertion sent to backend (no biometric data transmitted)
backend validates assertion in less than 50 milliseconds
total confirmation flow completes in less than 2 seconds
signal `biometric_confirmation_sent` emitted with timestamp
both Alice and Bob receive "Connection Established" only if mutual
neither party knows if non-mutual (preserves dignity)
Alice feels in control of every interest signal sent
≥90% of users rate confirmation flow as "private and secure"

elements.name: Alice is able to trust her biometric consent cannot be replayed or forged

steps.name: Phase 0 experimental environment is set up
test infrastructure is instrumented for measurement
privacy-compliant event tracking is enabled
Alice confirmed interest 2 minutes ago
attacker attempts to replay Alice's biometric assertion
backend rejects assertion (timestamp more than 30 seconds old)
connection request is denied
security team is alerted
signal `replay_attack_blocked` emitted
Alice's consent remains authentic and protected
Alice trusts her consent cannot be forged or replayed
≥95% of users trust the security model (after disclosure survey)

elements.name: Alice and Bob are able to receive instant mutual confirmation to proceed confidently

pass visual state updates to show active connection

elements.name: Alice is able to access health status using familiar Wallet interface

lab issues W3C Verifiable Credential for Alice with health passport claim

installed on Alice's iPhone
pass displays "Passport Valid Until [expiration date]"

pass can be opened without network connectivity
conversion completes in less than 5 seconds
signal `credential_converted_to_wallet` emitted
Alice understands her status at a glance
no technical knowledge required
≥90% of users understand how to find and present their status

elements.name: Bob is able to verify credentials anywhere without network dependency

expiration date is checked against current time
validation completes without network request in less than 1 second

elements.name: Alice is able to understand what information is protected by system design

steps.name: Phase 0 experimental environment is set up
test infrastructure is instrumented for measurement
privacy-compliant event tracking is enabled
Vault policy "no-pii-writes" is active
Alice's client accidentally attempts to write field "user_email" to token path
Vault rejects write with policy violation error
error message displays: "Personal information cannot be stored. Use anonymous tokens only."
no PII is stored in any backend system
violation is logged for security audit
signal `pii_write_blocked` emitted
Alice understands what information is protected (≥90% comprehension)
≥85% of users trust the technical enforcement

elements.name: Alice is able to understand issues and know when to retry

steps.name: Phase 0 experimental environment is set up
test infrastructure is instrumented for measurement
privacy-compliant event tracking is enabled
Vault backend is unreachable (simulated outage)
Alice attempts to connect with Bob
backend returns error: "Service temporarily unavailable"
no connection is created (fail-safe behavior)
Alice receives clear error message: "Please try again in a few minutes"
incident is logged for ops team immediate response
signal `backend_outage_detected` emitted
Alice understands it's temporary, not her fault
Alice understands what's wrong and when to retry (≥90% comprehension)
≥85% of users maintain trust in platform despite outage

elements.name: Bob is able to recover from temporary failures automatically

test infrastructure is instrumented for measurement
